topic.title: What's new in Release 15.1
topic.p: For Mingle onsite customers, please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 15.1

note.item: All of the features below are already available for our Mingle in the cloud customers.

section.title: Drag and Drop Attachments
section.p: You can now drag and drop images and files directly into your card and avoid the hassle of needing to search for your documents.

section.title: Time Tracker Functionality
section.p: If you are using table queries in any of your Mingle projects, you can now update any number properties inline within the table itself. Just set the 'edit-any-number-property' parameter to true in your table query macro to make use of this feature.

section.title: Checklists
section.p: Checklist items are a great way to quickly capture small tasks that are part of your Mingle card. You can add as many items as you'd like and even rearrange them by clicking and dragging them to prioritize the items.

section.title: Murmurs tab in card preview
section.p: Mingle cards now have Murmurs tab on the card preview so you can easily add a murmur right from the card. Now all your information related to a card can be easily viewed in one place. The murmur will also show in the global murmurs panel with the card number tagged automatically.

section.title: Murmur conversations
section.p: Mingle now groups your team's murmurs and replies in the global murmur panel and makes it easy to follow a conversation.

section.title: Fuzzy Search
section.p: You can search for card titles and card numbers to quickly access the card information from anywhere within your project.

section.title: Hotkeys
section.p: Keyboard shortcuts are now available in Mingle. It's so easy to scroll through your backlog, you won't even need your right hand. To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, click on the keyboard icon on the bottom right of the footer.

section.title: Right click for spell check
section.p: We've changed our right click options in the "WYSIWYG" to allow for your browser's spell checker. If you want to access Mingle's right click options, simply hold down "cmd/ctrl + right click"

section.title: Added story titles to murmur emails
section.p: When someone murmurs @ you from a card, the murmur email now includes the card title and number.

section.title: Added search to team member list
section.p: Last release, we introduced the team member list in the footer which allowed you to quickly assign a user to a card. We've added the ability to search for a team member to make it easier for large teams to find the right person.

section.title: Edit properties from card preview
section.p: Editing card properties is now easier than ever now that we've introduced the ability to edit directly from the card preview.

section.title: Transitions in drop down
section.p: We've cleaned up the card preview by grouping all of your card transitions into one easily managable button.

section.title: Card type moved
section.p: We've moved the card type to the upper left corner of the card preview to distinguish it from your card properties.

section.title: Delete button on card preview
section.p: We've surfaced the delete button to the card preview.

section.title: Tree properties now appear in the card preview
section.p: Tree properties are just as important as your regular card properties. They are now displayed alongside the rest of your card properties at the bottom of the card preview. You can edit tree properties from card preview just like any other properties.

section.title: Rank cards defaults to on
section.p: To help you prioritize cards, we've defaulted "rank cards" to be checked. You can always turn it off by simply unchecking "rank cards"

section.title: Bug fixes
section.p: The following bugs have been fixed with 15.1:
